content: On a full-year basis, adjusted net revenues of $2.8 billion declined 16% compared to 2021's record results. Turning to the businesses, fourth quarter advisory revenues of $704 million declined 27% year-over-year. Fourth quarter adjusted asset management and administration fees of $17 million decreased 23% year-over-year, while full year revenues of $71 million, decreased 9% compared to 2021, reflecting a decline in AUM, driven by market depreciation.
